mapper.insert: insert into CD_COMPANY (CD_COMPANY, NM_COMPANY, CD_CATEGORY, ID_USER, DS_OP_HOUR, DS_ADDR, DS_CONTACT, URL_COMPANY_IMG, ID_INSTAGRAM, DS_ABOUT) values (#{cdCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nmCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsOpHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlCompanyImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idInstagram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsAbout,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CD_COMPANY set NM_COMPANY = #{nmCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_CATEGORY = #{cdCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ID_USER = #{idUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_OP_HOUR = #{dsOpHour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_ADDR = #{dsAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_CONTACT = #{dsContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL_COMPANY_IMG = #{urlCompanyImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_INSTAGRAM = #{idInstagram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DS_ABOUT = #{dsAbout,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CD_COMPANY, NM_COMPANY, CD_CATEGORY, ID_USER, DS_OP_HOUR, DS_ADDR, DS_CONTACT, URL_COMPANY_IMG, ID_INSTAGRAM, DS_ABOUT from CD_COMPANY where CD_COMPANY = #{cdCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select CD_COMPANY, NM_COMPANY, CD_CATEGORY, ID_USER, DS_OP_HOUR, DS_ADDR, DS_CONTACT, URL_COMPANY_IMG, ID_INSTAGRAM, DS_ABOUT from CD_COMPANY

select CD_COMPANY, NM_COMPANY, CD_CATEGORY, ID_USER, DS_OP_HOUR, DS_ADDR, DS_CONTACT, URL_COMPANY_IMG, ID_INSTAGRAM, DS_ABOUT from CD_COMPANY where NM_COMPANY like CONCAT("%", #{nmCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")
